text: Aniboni yini ukuthi uMvelinqangi wenza noma yini esemazulwini yanithobela nanoma yini esemhlabeni futhi waphelelisa umusa wakhe phezu kwenu ngokugqamile nangokufihlekile futhi phakathi kwabantu kunalowo owenza impikiswano ngoMvelinqangi Ngaphandle kolwazi noma ngokuholwa noma ngencwadi ekhanyayo
